Package com.github.tadukoo.view.border

Class NoBorderUIResource

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.plaf.BorderUIResource
com.github.tadukoo.view.border.NoBorderUIResource
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.border.Border, javax.swing.plaf.UIResource
public class NoBorderUIResource
extends javax.swing.plaf.BorderUIResource
No Border UI Resource is a version of NoBorder that extends BorderUIResource, so that it can be used in Look & Feels in cases where you don't want a border, but can't use null
Version:
Alpha v.0.3
Author:
Logan Ferree (Tadukoo)
See Also:
Serialized Form

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    NoBorderUIResource()
